text: Presidio of Ahú was a prison in the city of Curitiba, Paraná, Brazil. (in Portuguese) It was the first prison in Curitiba, opened in 1905 . (in Portuguese) Closed in 2006, now is the site of recordings for film and television, such as: * Estomago; (in Portuguese) * 400 contra 1; * O Astro (2011): soap opera produced by Rede Globo de Televisão. (in Portuguese) ==References== Category:Curitiba Category:Prisons Category:1905 establishments in South America Category:1900s establishments in Brazil Category:2006 disestablishments Category:Disestablishments in Brazil
title: Presidio of Ahu
